input_text.Prompt:
Given a product specification and product features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
CafePress - Franklin Quote Liberty for Security Car Magnet 10 - Car Magnet 10 x 3, Magnetic Bumper Sticker

Product features:
Size: 10" x 3" rectangle
Printed on magnetic backed vinyl
Water and UV resistant inks
IMPORTED
input_text.Response A: CafePress brings your passions to life with the perfect item for every occasion. With thousands of designs to choose from, you are certain to find the unique item you've been seeking. Hit the road with this vinyl car magnet! Add instant style to your vehicle with a vinyl car magnet from CafePress. Magnetic backed vinyl car magnets stick to most any metal surface. Choose from a variety of sizes and designs.
input_text.Response B: This CafePress - Franklin Quote Liberty for Security Car Magnet 10 - Car Magnet 10 x 3, Magnetic Bumper Sticker is printed on magnetic backed vinyl with UV and water-resistant inks. The magnet is a 10" x 3" rectangle. It is imported.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
